meanings.definition: A traditional garment worn around the waist in South and Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: He tied the colorful lungi around his waist for the traditional dance.
meanings.sent2: In the market, you can find lungis in various patterns and colors.
meanings.sent3: The lungi decided to take a walk around the village on its own!
meanings.sent4: His lungi of courage helped him face the challenges ahead.
meanings.sent5: The soft fabric of the lungi fluttered in the breeze as he walked.

meanings.definition: A type of cloth used to make the garment mentioned above.
meanings.sent1: The tailor carefully selected the lungi fabric for the traditional attire.
meanings.sent2: She bought a few meters of lungi to stitch her own garment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat played hide-and-seek with the lungi material.
meanings.sent4: The vibrant lungi cloth painted a picture of cultural richness.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the lungi material made it a favorite among locals.
